metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10241 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Jetty version 9.2.26 and older, 9.3.25 and older, and 9.4.15 and older, the server is vulnerable to XSS conditions if a remote client USES a specially formatted URL against the DefaultServlet or ResourceHandler that is configured for showing a Listing of directory contents.

criterions.comment: jetty9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
